text: Prosopocera callypiga is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Thomson in 1857, originally under the genus Ceroplesis. It is known from Tanzania, and possibly South Africa.BioLib.cz - Prosopocera callypiga. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Prosopocerini Category:Beetles described in 1857
title: Prosopocera callypiga
